description: This is a C++ implementation of the contour integral method by Beyn ("An integral method for solving nonlinear eigenvalue problems", https://doi.org/10.1016/j.laa.2011.03.030).
references: W.-J. Beyn. "An integral method for solving nonlinear eigenvalue problems". In: Linear Algebra and its Applications 436.10 (2012). Special Issue dedicated to Heinrich Voss’s 65th birthday, pp. 3839–3863. issn: 0024-3795. doi: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.laa.2011.03.030. url: https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0024379511002540.
